article: We ve been good friends for so many years. And I don t think you meant to do that ... I said to myself looking at Jack my friend who was running across the _ field.How I wish I could join them But it was impossible because of the pain in my left foot caused by Jack.I first met Jack in a football match in the elementary school. When my team looked as if we were _ Jack who was watching volunteered to join us. He was so confident and skilled that we won. From then on Jack and I often played together and became best friends.But something happened before an important football match between Class Six and my class. My class had so many good players that we had to _ the best ones. Jack and I were in the same team. The match was close in the first half. I saw my chance and was ready to score a goal. Suddenly Jack _ me. He slid to stop the ball but collided with my left foot. I knew I had lost the chance to score and was _ the field. But what really hurt me was that Jack didn t say sorry. And when some of my teammates said he did it on purpose to _ me from scoring I felt even _ .Now I stand here with tears in my eyes. I don t want to _ those words but I don t know how to persuade myself they are _ . Then everything changes when Jack scores and wins How excited I am While I am still _ in excitement someone pats my shoulder. It is Jack with a smile on his face. I m sorry that you can not join in because of my _ . But you see Jason we beat them No matter whether you joined in or not you ve made a contribution. Come on let s celebrate Suddenly I am _ by the players. The sunshine is so bright that I close my eyes. Riding high above my teammates I feel so happy. And I know the friendship between Jack and me will last forever.
